panels.scene_description: Dimly lit 3 a.m. NOC: a wall of Geneos tiles glows bright-green while Wanjiru clutches a shrieking pager; Slack alerts cascade across a side monitor, contrasting calm dashboards with crisis tension.
panels.narration: Alerts blare even as every dashboard light stays stubbornly green.

panels.scene_description: Conference-bridge screen share: Wanjiru’s cursor hovers over a 500 error log while a mosaic of all-green graphs fills the background; VP Manu appears in a video tile, brows knit in disbelief.

speech_bubbles.Manu: CPU looks fine. Can we just fail over to a bigger node?
speech_bubbles.Wanjiru: It’s row-locking—but I can’t prove it without traces.

panels.narration: The gulf between spotless resource graphs and failing transactions widens.

panels.scene_description: Hector bursts in, coffee in one hand, rugged ThinkPad in the other; a terminal on the big screen scrolls `WriteTimeoutException` lines while Wanjiru highlights the log.

speech_bubbles.Hector: Green graphs at 3 a.m. are polite strangers.
speech_bubbles.Wanjiru: Logs show lock waits, but no trace IDs!

panels.narration: First evidence surfaces: real errors hidden behind healthy probes.

panels.scene_description: Lights dimmed; Hector points a laser at a Prometheus console plotting a crimson 5xx line that spikes above a flat green CPU graph; Manu folds arms skeptically.

speech_bubbles.Hector: Monitoring shows symptoms. Observability shows pathology.

panels.narration: Correlated metrics expose the hidden shape of failure.

panels.scene_description: Juana scrolls an endless log file—each line a lock-wait error with `trace_id:null`; Hector leans in, finger on the empty field; a Grafana Explore tab waits nearby.

speech_bubbles.Juana: Twenty-thousand errors and not a single trace ID.
speech_bubbles.Hector: A log without correlation is gossip.

panels.narration: They confront the cost of missing context.

panels.scene_description: Whiteboard scene: three colored pillars labeled Logs, Metrics, Traces interconnected by arrows; Hector draws while Wanjiru, Juana, and Manu take notes; a Mermaid diagram glows on a side display.

speech_bubbles.Hector: Resilience is diagnostic skill, not a hardware SKU.

panels.narration: Hector synthesizes the observability pillars into a single narrative.

panels.scene_description: Dawn light warms the NOC: a blue graph captioned ‘row-lock wait = 0’ replaces the red; Hector hands a marker to Wanjiru beside a sticky note reading ‘Green ≠ Healthy’.

speech_bubbles.Hector: Green means nothing until it speaks in the customer's voice.

panels.narration: Systems recovered, the team prepares to harden telemetry for next time.
